data.title: Information for getting to Newhaven Ferry Terminal
meta_keywords: newhaven ferry port address. parking at newhaven port
data.meta_description: Newhaven Port address details and directions for travelling to Newhaven port by car, train or bus.
data.text:
Getting to Newhaven Ferry Port

Newhaven Ferry Port Directions

All the information you need when taking a ferry to or from Newhaven to Dieppe in France. To make a ferry booking with ferryonline use our booking form above, compare prices and save.

Newhaven Ferry Port by Car

From London/M23/Brighton: If travelling from London take the M23 and then take the A27 Brighton to Eastbourne road. Drive past Lewes and then take the A26 to Newhaven. Once in Newhaven follow signs to the port.

Newhaven Ferry Port By Rail

Newhaven ferry port has its own station Newhaven Harbour Station and is just a short walk to the ferry terminal. Trains from London to Newhaven generally require one change. Local services run from Seaford, Lewes and Brighton to Newhaven.

However LD Lines currently ask that Foot Passengers arriving by train must alight at Newhaven Town Station AND NOT Newhaven Harbour Station.

Newhaven Ferry Port By Coach

National Express operate a regular coach service from London Victoria and other UK pick up points to Newhaven. A regular local bus service follows daily routes to and from Brighton, Seaford, Peacehaven, Dover, Bexhill, Rye, Folkestone and Hastings.

Parking at Newhaven Ferry Port

There is both long and short term parking available near the port.
